message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable product. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm starting with a price of $15000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to listen to your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.

I understand you're looking to meet in the middle, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $13000. This is a fair price considering the value the product holds for you.

I understand that the product holds value, but I'm still looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm counteroffering at $11500. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $11500. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $12500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price for the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a final offer of $11000. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle one last time.
